verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:29
verses.text: O that they were wise, that they understood this, that they would consider their latter end!

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:30
verses.text: How should one chase a thousand, and two put ten thousand to flight, except their Rock had sold them, and the Lord had shut them up?

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:31
verses.text: For their rock is not as our Rock, even our enemies themselves being judges.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:32
verses.text: For their vine is of the vine of Sodom, and of the fields of Gomorrah: their grapes are grapes of gall, their clusters are bitter:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:33
verses.text: Their wine is the poison of dragons, and the cruel venom of asps.
